history.description: Creating GIS web solutions for public and municipality employees
Modifing and creating web parts using Sharepoint
Working on multible GIS apps for Public Authority for Civil Information, Kuwait.

projects.name: PACI Real-time Data Analyzer
projects.description: GIS Web Application implements Real-time data visualization for Kuwait finder users. Analyze real-time data to create live dashboard like active users, speed, and entry beat. Track users by specific time or latest feeds. Send notification to users who enter specific area (Geo-fence). Add heatmap for traffic Jam areas.

projects.name: National Register of State Land
projects.description: A prototype (demonstrator) of the NRSL created to help future users of the NRSL to understand what it will be and what type of functionality they can expect. The prototype developed on a Geographic Information System, included just a subset of the business requirements of the final NRSL and cover a small geographical area of Kuwait. The prototype provided a key channel for engaging with key stakeholders across the land sector.

projects.name: Khafji Joint Operations - KJO
projects.subtitle: POC
projects.description: Incident management service integrates the capabilities of GIS and AtHoc notification system

projects.name: Openware Website
projects.description: Create careers and events admin pages for marketing and HR teams. Fixand maintain some bugs and add some functionality to funerals page

projects.name: OpenEye AVLs - Automatic Vehicle Location
projects.description: Responsive JavaScript version from OpenEye WPF.Recieving stream data as XML including spatial information to display and track on map

history.description: Working in scrum team on multible GIS apps for Eastern Municipality, KSA.

projects.name: Web AppBuilder for ArcGIS
projects.description: Web AppBuilder is a configurable application developed by Esri to enable normal user to create their own application based on ArcGIS Online account. I configured and managed existing widgets like Attribute table and created new customized widgets.

projects.name: Split & Merge
projects.description: Web AppBuilder is a configurable application developed by Esri to enable normal user to create their own application based on ArcGIS Online account. I configured and managed existing widgets like Attribute table and created new customized widgets.

history.description: Working on multible GIS apps for Riyadh Municipality ,GIS Center, KSA.

projects.name: Survey report
projects.description: Online service enable citizens to create new request for survey report for 30 purpose like building license, split & merge parcels, and others. Citizen or its representative Create request based on Baladiya where parcel located, attach required documents and draw the proposed situation on map if required. Employee receive this request and generate survey report after reviewing and validating it with technical requirements.

projects.name: Support System
projects.description: Supplementary application for Survey Report App but used by Municipality and Baladiya Employees to handle citizen requests to create S.R. Employee can edit, review citizen request, submit S.R and initiate new split request.

projects.name: Reverse Proxy
projects.description: Implement Proxy server for ArcGIS server 10 based on Application Request Routing (ARR) with IIS 7.

projects.name: Map Explorer – Riyadh
projects.description: Interactive map explorer for Riyadh municipality which enable users to do the main functionalities on map like draw, measurements, navigate, query, bookmark, On/Off layers , printing, and sharing map with others via E-mail.

history.description: Working on Egypt Census map production.
